Comment: I understand you‚Äôre being a smartass. But some of the ways He‚Äôs made Himself known to me are this: The day after my wife and I found out she‚Äôs pregnant, we went to Church. ‚ÄúCoincidentally‚Äù, the Pastor‚Äôs message that day was about being pregnant. That gave us peace that only He could provide at a time that we had no idea what to do.   Another time, it was the first time I ever gave money to the Church, I was very against it. The next day while I was at work, this couple my same age came in and would not stop talking to me about Jesus. How He‚Äôs worked in their lives and how He has blessed them ever since they started tithing. I closed that deal and made over $1000 in commission. ‚ÄúCoincidentally‚Äù a huge blessing for my family the day after I gave to the Church.   Another time, at Church the Pastor was talking about how he had received random checks in the mail that helped him get by in times of need. I said a prayer to God and called bullshit on it. I said, ‚ÄúGod I‚Äôm sorry but I just don‚Äôt believe this guy. That you were sending him money in the mail to make ends meet? I‚Äôve never gotten a check in the mail that I wasn‚Äôt expecting.‚Äù That was on Sunday. On Tuesday that next week I received a check in the mail from an overpayment on a medical bill. What a ‚Äúcoincidence‚Äù but I know it was God showing me that He can do anything.  I have countless more examples of ‚Äúcoincidences‚Äù like that. I‚Äôm not saying God appears to me in a vision, as a person, on toast, etc. These ‚Äúcoincidences‚Äù are God moving in my life and making Himself known to me in a way that only He can.   I would just encourage you to be open and pray to Him. Ask Him to make Himself known to you. Have a blessed day brother.
